org.radarcns.auth.authorization

Class RadarAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarcns.auth.authorization.RadarAuthorization

  • public class RadarAuthorization
extends java.lang.Object
    Authorization helper class for RADAR. This class checks if the authenticated user is allowed to access the protected resources of a given subject based on the authorities and project affiliations.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPermission

        public static void checkPermission(com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT token,
                                   Permission permission)
        Check if the user authenticated with the given token has the given permission. Not taking into account project affiliations.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the logged in user
        permission - The permission to check

      • checkPermissionOnProject

        public static void checkPermissionOnProject(com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT token,
                                            Permission permission,
                                            java.lang.String projectName)
        Check if the user authenticated with the given token has the given permission in a project.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the logged in user
        permission - The permission to check
        projectName - The project for which to check the permission

      • checkPermissionOnSubject

        public static void checkPermissionOnSubject(com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT token,
                                            Permission permission,
                                            java.lang.String projectName,
                                            java.lang.String subjectName)
        Check if the user authenticated with the given token has the given permission on a specific subject in a project.
        Parameters:
        token - The token of the logged in user
        permission - The permission to check
        projectName - The project for which to check the permission
        subjectName - The name of the subject to check

      • isJustParticipant

        public static boolean isJustParticipant(com.auth0.jwt.interfaces.DecodedJWT token,
                                        java.lang.String projectName)
        Check if this user is just a participant in the project.
        Parameters:
        token - Token of the authenticated user
        projectName - Project to check
        Returns:
        true if PARTICIPANT is the only authority of the user in the project, false otherwise
